GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.82 to before v4.19.220
GSD.description:
rxrpc: Fix rxrpc_local leak in rxrpc_lookup_peer()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.220 by commit 913c24af2d13a3fd304462916ee98e298d56bdce, it was introduced in version v4.19.82 by commit e8e51ce79c157188e209e5ea0afaf6b42dd76104. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rxrpc: Fix rxrpc_local leak in rxrpc_lookup_peer()
